desc: WORLD FAMOUS HOMEMADE PIE SHOPPE! Our retail shop is open daily and stocked with endless amounts of handmade foods and specialty desserts. We are here to bring you a unique small town, homemade experience.

layout.text:
HOME OF WHALANS WORLD FAMOUS PIE SHOPPE
Our pies are made from scratch and fresh-baked on days open.

Call 507-467-2623 for current days & hours or follow us on Facebook.
